title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
description: The New Package Wizard in the IDE is displaying a confusing message.
OB: When I try to create a new package in a Java project, the wizard shows a message that is not clear.
EB: I expect the New Package Wizard to display a clear and easily understandable message.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new Java Project. 
2. Select the project. 
3. Attempt to create a new package.
